attributes.action: Stop the closer of The VALE of LEVEN hospital
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Hospitals are very important places, if you have a heart attack it is speed that saves the lives of people, if the nearest hospital is a long way it could be the difference between life and death. What price life!!!!!  There are a lot of elderly people living around VALE of LEVEN hospital, people who have worked all there lives, paid taxes, fought in the war. Don't they 
DESERVE MORE. I will hope you think about what i have had to say, as i know a lot of people in the area. 
Thanks for reading my e.mail.
